mapper.insert: insert into tb_member ( mem_name, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_nickname, mem_pass, post_no, addr_default, addr_detail, manager_at, social_at ) values ( #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memNickname}, #{memPass}, #{postNo}, #{addrDefault}, #{addrDetail}, 0 , 0 )
insert into tb_member(mem_name, mem_email, social_at, mem_nickname) values ( #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{socialAt}, #{memNickname})
mapper.select: select * from tb_member where mem_nickname like concat('%',#{nick},'%')

SELECT *, (select count(*) from tb_recipe r where r.mem_no = m.mem_no and m.mem_nickname = #{nick}) `recipe_cnt`, (select count(*) from tb_recipe_follow f where f.follow_mem_no = m.mem_no and m.mem_nickname = #{nick} and f.follow_status = 'Y') `follower`, (select count(*) from tb_recipe_follow f where f.follower_mem_no = m.mem_no and m.mem_nickname = #{nick} and f.follow_status = 'Y') `follow` FROM tb_member m where mem_nickname = #{nick}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_scrap (mem_no, imgpath, title) values(#{memNo},#{imgPath},#{title});
